traits.name: Danger Sense
traits.desc: The ruffian has advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

traits.name: Dueling Fighting Style
traits.desc: The ruffian gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls while wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons (included in the attack).

traits.name: Horde Breaker (1/Turn)
traits.desc: When the ruffian makes a weapon attack, it can make another attack roll with the same weapon against a different creature within 5 feet of the original target and within range of its weapon.

traits.name: Rage (4/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the ruffian can enter a rage for 1 minute. While raging, the ruffian gains the following benefits: * Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws * Melee weapon attacks deal an addition 2 damage. * The ruffian gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The ruffian is a 3th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The ruffian has the following ranger spells prepared: * 1st level (2 slots): cure wounds, jump, speak with animals

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While not wearing armor, the ruffian's AC includes its Constitution modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ruffian makes three battleaxe attacks or two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage is used while raging.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
